column4: What's a good PDF reader that has abilities similar to acrobat that will let me select and copy pictures?
Acrobat. Or else xpdf is quite good (not sure if it lets you copy images though)
it looks like acrobat won't install from apt. Where do I get it? says no installation candidate?
it's proprietary software. It might be available if you enable Universe and Multiverse, I'm not sure. If not, just go to the Adobe Acrobat Reader website and grab it from there.
